Name: Lost Oliver
About the game: About Lost Oliver is a Pok√©mon-inspired casual puzzle game with pixel art style from old gameboy games. You control little Oliver's mother and your objective is to use her special abilities to rescue her lost cub. Features Universal language: players of any nationality can play without any problems, as the game communicates through images and symbols. Two animated Cutscenes: Intro/Ending 7 different special abilities Several unique handmade levels Retro pixelated graphics Relaxing soundtrack and sound effects
